external_references.source_name: Orkhan Mamedov, Fedor Sinitsyn, Anton Ivanov October 2017
external_references.description: Orkhan Mamedov, Fedor Sinitsyn, Anton Ivanov 2017, October 27 Bad Rabbit Ransomware Retrieved. 2019/10/27

objects.description: [Bad Rabbit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0606) ransomware spreads through drive-by attacks where insecure websites are compromised. While the target is visiting a legitimate website, a malware dropper is being downloaded from the threat actors infrastructure. (Citation: Orkhan Mamedov, Fedor Sinitsyn, Anton Ivanov October 2017)
